nodes.text: The Royal Marine Regiment, abbreviated RMR, was an elite military unit of the Royal Naboo Security Forces.

During the Galactic Civil War, the Royal Marine Regiment raided the Mauler base near the city of Keren. The Mauler chief tactician Zolo Sartain, the chief of security Yarick Tempol, the assassin Xylan Kee'choap and the mystic Walus Mutin were eliminated during the operation.
